# 奇安信：紫队视角下的实战攻防演习组织

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/qi-anxin-zidui-shijiao-xia-de-shizhan-gongfang-yanxi-zuzhi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/qi-anxin-zidui-shijiao-xia-de-shizhan-gongfang-yanxi-zuzhi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install qi-anxin-zidui-shijiao-xia-de-shizhan-gongfang-yanxi-zuzhi
qi-anxin-zidui-shijiao-xia-de-shizhan-gongfang-yanxi-zuzhi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g qi-anxin-zidui-shijiao-xia-de-shizhan-gongfang-yanxi-zuzhi
qi-anxin-zidui-shijiao-xia-de-shizhan-gongfang-yanxi-zuzhi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
